articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Kwon Jong Ung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Kwon Jong Ung
						
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a wreath to the bier of Kwon Jong Ung, former writer of the April 15 Literary Production Company who is a winner of Kim Il Sung Prize and labor hero, on August 23, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: North-South Parties Issue Appeal on "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty"
articles.content:
North-South Parties Issue Appeal on "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty"
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The Korean Social Democratic Party and the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea issued a joint appeal to all the Koreans Monday as regards the lapse of a centenary since the Japanese imperialists fabricated the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" by force to "legalize" their military occupation and colonial rule over Korea. 
					 It recalled that the Japanese imperialists fabricated by force different kinds of treaties of aggression such as the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" in disregard of elementary requirements of international law and pursued colonial repressive rule for more than 40 years, imposing a miserable slave life upon the Korean nation and vandalizing and looting many cultural relics, treasures and natural resources of Korea. 
					
					 A centenary has passed since the fabrication of the aggressive treaty but Japan has dodged sincere apology and reparation for its past crimes, it noted, and continued:
					
					 The recent statement made by the Japanese chief executive was nothing but half "apology" as it excluded the DPRK, an empty talk as it did not mention any reparation. It was another mockery of the Korean nation and remarks deceiving it. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries, far from drawing a lesson from their blood-stained history of crimes, are openly pursuing the moves to grab Tok islets, distort history and convert Japan into a military power and policies of discrimination and contempt against the Koreans in Japan and rushing headlong into nuclear weaponization. 
					
					 All the Koreans should unite as one irrespective of idea, ism and system under the patriotic banner of struggle against Japan, be they in the north and the south and overseas, and thus wage dynamic solidarity actions to force Japan to pay for the crimes committed against the Koreans for a centenary this year, the "year of joint anti-Japanese struggle". 
					
					 The two parties in their appeal ardently called on all Koreans in the north and the south and overseas to unite close and more dynamically turn out in the struggle for national reunification and the joint anti-Japanese solidarity actions this year, the 10th anniversary of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the centenary of the fabrication of the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" which brought national ruin to the Koreans.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visits Unit under KPA Tank Division
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visits Unit under KPA Tank Division
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here visited a unit under the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on Monday on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Being briefed on the fact that the unit has developed into an invincible combat ranks under leadership of Kim Jong Il, the members of the corps went round soldiers' bedroom, education room and mess hall.
					
					 They watched tank crewmen in training and a performance given by an art squad.

articles.title: Meeting Marks Anniversary of Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership
articles.content:
Meeting Marks Anniversary of Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- A meeting of workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea took place at the plaza of the Party Founding Memorial Tower, a meeting of agricultural workers on Chol Pass, Kangwon Province and a meeting of members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea at the Arch of Triumph Square on August 22 and 23 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Reports and speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 Reporters and speakers said that August 25, Juche 49 (1960) when Kim Jong Il started his Songun revolutionary leadership was the historical day when he declared the iron faith and will as a brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu to accomplish with arms the Korean revolution which was started and advanced with arms.
					
					 They referred to the fact that his start of the Songun revolutionary leadership opened a great history of succession and brought about a new turning point in building the revolutionary armed forces and carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 They noted that possessed of extraordinary leadership caliber and prominent political and military ability, Kim Jong Il has developed the People's Army into an invincible army with his unique Songun revolutionary leadership for five decades, performing undying exploits in army building and exalting the dignity and honor of the country and the nation before the whole world.
					
					 They declared that everlasting will be the revolutionary exploits Kim Jong Il has performed by bringing about epoch-making changes unprecedented in the history of the nation and translating the ideal of the people into reality with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 Meanwhile, a performance was given by members of the art group of the Pyongyang Students and Children's Palace on Monday on the same occasion.

articles.title: Documentary Film Screened
articles.content:
Documentary Film Screened
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Korean documentary film "Providing a Great Turn with the Songun Revolutionary Leadership" was screened at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The film deals with the historical facts that Kim Jong Il unrolled his unique Songun politics of putting forward the Korean People's Army as a pillar and a main force of the revolution and dynamically pushing forward the overall socialist cause in reliance upon it when the Korean revolution was facing a rigorous trial, thereby turning misfortune into blessing and adversity into favorable conditions and achieving signal successes in all fields. 
					
					 The film has scenes showing the undying leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il who has opened a new history of great changes by making sure that the KPA made a breakthrough in the main fronts of the socialist economic construction and the revolutionary soldier spirit prevailed throughout the society.
					
					 The film also deals with the facts that by providing the Songun revolutionary leadership Kim Jong Il brought about a landmark phase in national reunification and remarkably raised the international prestige of the DPRK. 
					
					 The film was watched by senior Party and state officials, a chairperson of a friendly party and officials of ministries and national institution.

articles.title: 11th National Invention and New Technology Exhibition Closes
articles.content:
11th National Invention and New Technology Exhibition Closes
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The 11th national invention and new technology exhibition which had been under way since Aug. 16 closed with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition on Monday. 
					 On display at the exhibition were achievements made by officials, scientists and technicians from across the country in the course of their brisk mass technical innovation movement for putting the national economy on a Juche-oriented, modern and scientific basis. 
					
					 While the exhibition was under way there were technology exchange, intellectual products circulation and technological information service and measures were taken to introduce scientific and technological achievements substantially conductive to building an economic power. 
					
					 Present there were Jon Ha Chol, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Kim Yong Jin, chairman of the Education Commission, Jang Chol, president of the State Academy of Sciences, officials concerned, scientists and technicians.

articles.title: Website Opened to Introduce DPRK Pavilion of Shanghai World Expo
articles.content:
Website Opened to Introduce DPRK Pavilion of Shanghai World Expo
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- A website has recently been opened to introduce the DPRK Pavilion of the 2010 Shanghai World Expo, along with the capital city of Pyongyang and the history, culture and customs of the Korean people. The website address is www.expo2010-dprkorea.org.
					 On the theme of the DPRK Pavilion "Pyongyang Prospering on the Basis of the Culture of the Taedong River", the website offers videos showing grand monumental edifices, including the Tower of the Juche Idea, and historic spots such as the Ulmil Pavilion and Chilsong Gate in Pyongyang, and art performances given by the Unhasu Orchestra and other national art troupes, Korean schoolchildren and visiting foreign artistes.
					
					 A video of the grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang" and music videos of songs of revolutionary operas "The Flower Girl" and "Sea of Blood" and such popular songs as "My Wife" are available on the website. 
					
					 It also gives a detailed introduction of the mausoleum of Koryo founder Wang Kon, the Ryongthong Temple, Sonjuk Bridge and other historic relics in Kaesong, national customs including folk dishes and tourist destinations such as Mts. Paektu, Kumgang, Myohyang and Chilbo.
					
					 A stream of foreigners visiting the DPRK Pavilion is also seen on the website. 
					
					 September 6 will be Day of the DPRK Pavilion.

articles.title: DPRK Wins Special Prize at Ettlingen Piano Int'l Competition
articles.content:
DPRK Wins Special Prize at Ettlingen Piano Int'l Competition
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Pak Kon Ui, a student of the DPRK, was awarded a special prize at the 12th International Ettlingen Competition for Young Pianists.
					 This competition, a biannual event in Germany, attracts keen interest of young pianists and piano fans as it is one of the prestigious piano competitions in the world.
					
					 The final competition brought together 108 excellent young pianists (below 20 years old) from 26 countries and regions such as the DPRK, China, Poland, the Czech Republic, Indonesia, Britain, the U.S. and Japan who had been selected in the preliminaries.
					
					 The competition, divided into two groups, took place from Aug. 7 to 15. 
					
					 12 years old Pak took the jury and experts by surprise and won their unreserved appreciation for successfully meeting music requirements with his high skill and flawless rendition.
					
					 At an awarding ceremony he who finished third received the Barenreiter Press Prize, a special prize traditionally awarded to a winner.
					
					 After emerging the only recipient of two prizes in the group Pak appeared at the concert of prize winners on Aug. 15, once again winning great appreciation of organizers of the competition and its jury and the audience.
					
					 The mayor of Ettlingen City and chairpersons of the organizing committee and the jury of the competition and participants of the competition were unanimous that it was natural for Pak from the DPRK, the youngest of the prize winners, to receive the special prize, expressing belief that he would become a world famous pianist.

articles.title: Light Comedy "Echo of Mountain" Enjoys Greater Popularity
articles.content:
Light Comedy "Echo of Mountain" Enjoys Greater Popularity
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Light comedy "Echo of Mountain", a winner of Kim Il Sung Prize, is enjoying increasing popularity in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The light comedy, created by the then Kangwon Provincial Art Theatre in the early 1960s and recreated by the State Theatrical Troupe this year, vividly represents the noble spiritual world and revolutionary working manner of the people in the Chollima era.
					
					 It inspires people to love socialist society and add luster to the Songun era, making tremendous achievements in their work.
					
					 It also gives people the truth of life.
					
					 Seeing the performance calling for making continued innovations, not contented with what has been done, and advancing at the speed of Chollima (legendary horse running 250 miles a day), not moving slowly like a donkey, the audience resolve upon making a great leap in the building of a thriving nation as those in the Chollima era did. 
					
					 After enjoying the light comedy again some time ago, General Secretary Kim Jong Il said it served as a good companion of the army and people and a textbook of their life.

articles.title: Japanese Imperialists' Germ Warfare Disclosed
articles.content:
Japanese Imperialists' Germ Warfare Disclosed 
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that the Japanese imperialists conducted a secret test for germ weapons in Pusan of Korea to be used against the United States.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The Japanese imperialists were hell-bent on a germ warfare to kill everything alive, human beings or animals, in a bid to ensure a "victory" in the Second World War.
					
					 The fact tells that their germ warfare caused damage not only to Koreans and other people of Asia but to the U.S.
					
					What merits serious attention is that they chose Korea as a site for germ weapon test. During their colonial rule over Korea, they massacred at least one million Koreans, forced 200,000 Korean women into sexual slavery and used Korea as a site for their germ weapon test. All these crimes were prompted by their inhuman policy of exterminating the Korean nation. This was hideous crimes perpetrated not only against the Korean people but against humankind.
					
					 Japan is now resorting to despicable and crafty moves to conceal all the crimes the Japanese imperialists committed in the past, including their germ warfare. But the reality indicates that with no sleight of hand it can cover up their base crimes.
					
					 Japan should honestly admit and apologize for all germ warfare atrocities committed by the Japanese imperialists during their past rule and its active involvement in the germ warfare perpetrated by the U.S. imperialists during the last Korean War.
					
					 There is no future for those who are not ready to repent of their crimes and do not make efforts to redeem them.

articles.title: Lee Group's Suppression of Rev. Han Sang Ryol under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Group's Suppression of Rev. Han Sang Ryol under Fire
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group conducted an intensive investigation into Rev. Han Sang Ryol, permanent adviser of the Solidarity for Progress, after arresting him  on August 20 upon his return to south Korea from his visit to Pyongyang. This is brutal suppression of reunification and patriotism and unjustifiable anti-reunification act.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed commentary.
					
					 What Rev. Han did in Pyongyang was nothing but his call for implementing the north-south declarations to give continuity to the June 15 era of reunification, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 His visit to Pyongyang commanded positive support and praise from all Koreans in the north and the south and overseas desirous of national unity and peace and reunification of the country.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group's brutal crackdown upon Rev. Han on charges of his Pyongyang visit was not targeted against him alone.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group cooked up the "Cheonan" case, a hideous anti-DPRK farce, bringing the inter-Korean relations to a total collapse and driving the situation to the brink of a war. This triggered off a strong protest among progressive organizations and personages which threw the Lee group into an extreme ruling crisis.
					
					 Much upset by this, the puppet group launched a merciless repressive campaign in a bid to weather the crisis and ensure stability of its power in the latter half of its office, labeling the forces standing for reunification through alliance with the north "pro-north leftist forces" and "forces subservient to the north." Meanwhile, this group is seeking to use Rev. Han's visit to Pyongyang as an excuse for totally stamping them out.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group had better halt at once its reckless suppression of pro-reunification figures, properly understanding the mind-set of the south Koreans and all other Koreans whose hearts are burning with hatred and resentment at it.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group Searches House of Rev. Han Sang Ryol
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group Searches House of Rev. Han Sang Ryol
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group searched the house of Rev. Han Sang Ryol, permanent co-representative of the Solidarity for Progress, on August 21, according to south Korean KBS.
					 The fascist maniacs rushed in his house in Jonju City, North Jolla Province, investigating the contents of computer and confiscating books and photos.
					
					 In another development, the group of traitors formed the joint investigation team with the puppet Intelligence Service and police, getting hell-bent on the suppression of Rev. Han.
					
					 That day the puppet group applied for the warrant of arrest for him on charges of the violation of the "National Security Law", claiming that he "visited the north without the government's permission" and "conducted anti-government activities in the north" and the like.

articles.title: Crackdown upon Rev. Han Sang Ryol Flailed
articles.content:
Crackdown upon Rev. Han Sang Ryol Flailed
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The Japanese Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration issued a statement on August 20 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its fascist suppression of Rev. Han Sang Ryol of south Korea.
					 The statement accused the Lee regime of unreasonably arresting the reverend while incriminating his righteous action for the reunification of nation, far from welcoming him.
					
					 It went on to say:
					
					 It is natural that compatriots in the south and the north meet with each other, talk about the country's reunification and discuss the ways for the reconciliation and unity of the nation. His visit to the DPRK with the conscience of religionist aspiring after the peaceful reunification deserves appraisal, not suppression.
					
					 Traitor Lee is a special class criminal who should be put under restraint as he mercilessly suppressed the reunification champion who conducted the just and righteous activities for the reunification of the nation.
					
					 The Lee regime is sadly mistaken if it calculates it can stay in power and dampen the desire of the nation for reconciliation and reunification through the frantic fascist crackdown, the statement warned, urging it to stop at once the suppression of the reunification champion and immediately release him.

articles.title: Appointment Jo Hyon Ho as Chief of Police Agency Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Appointment Jo Hyon Ho as Chief of Police Agency Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Human rights, civic and public organizations in south Korea issued a joint statement on August 19 in protest against the puppet authorities' action to appoint Jo Hyon Ho, chief of the puppet Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency ill-famed for being a fascist maniac, as chief of the "National Police Agency."
					 As far as Jo Hyon Ho is concerned, he slandered the former "president" who signed the October 4 declaration and branded those who turned out to express the democratic will including candlelight actions in 2008 as "forces disturbing law and order", the statement said, and went on:
					
					 He committed extreme human rights abuses such as instructing police to fire water cannon at the participants in a meeting in winter and mercilessly suppressing a strike of the Ssangyong Motors Workers Union. 
					
					 He has become an icon of cruel and brutal police as he shut his eyes to irregularities and corruption of the police and committed illegal acts, behaving mercilessly towards people under the signboard of "law-abiding order." It is an insult to the people to have informally designated this guy as chief of the "National Police Agency."
					
					 The statement urged Lee Myung Bak to cancel the action taken to appoint Jo as police chief, drawing a lesson from the miserable end met by the preceding dictators.

articles.title: Significant Days of DPRK Observed by Foreigners
articles.content:
Significant Days of DPRK Observed by Foreigners
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Film shows and book and photo exhibitions took place in France, Russia, Malaysia and India between August 13 and 17 to commemorate the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership and the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Displayed at the exhibition halls were books and photos introducing the revolutionary feats of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched such Korean films as "Arms of Korea", "The Arch of Triumph" and "The Ever victorious Military Ranks in Parade."
					
					  Speeches were made at the events.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked in Brazil
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked in Brazil
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- The Brazil-Korea Friendship Association issued bulletin titled "Everlasting Exploits of President Kim Il Sung for National Liberation" on August 10 to mark the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 65 years have passed since Korea was freed from the Japanese imperialists' military occupation, the bulletin said, adding that the country's liberation was a historic event that brought about a signal turn in the Korean people's destiny and gave birth to socialist Korea.
					
					Thanks to the country's liberation, a country for the people was built in Korea for the first time in the nation's history spanning 5,000 years, the bulletin said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK completed the postwar rehabilitation and construction and accomplished the socialist transformation of relations of production in a short span of time and realized the industrialization in just 14 years under the condition where everything was destroyed owing to the war ignited by the United States. The DPRK has turned into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence. 
					
					 It is now building new factories and edifices based on the latest science and technology as required by the IT era one after another and successfully attaining the goal of building an economic power while stepping up the overall technological updating.
					
					 The DPRK, regarding the Juche idea as the firm guidelines of the state building and activities, has resolutely rejected the interference and pressure by outside forces and reliably defended the sovereignty and dignity of the nation.
					
					 The feats performed by the President for Korea's liberation will remain long with eternally prospering socialist Korea, the bulletin concluded.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
 Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was brought out in pamphlet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia to mark the 50th anniversary of his start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun-based revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is an effective political mode of the present era which carried forward and developed the idea and line of President Kim Il Sung on attaching importance to arms and a scientific revolutionary line and a political mode most correctly reflecting the requirements of the times and the revolution. It also refers to the validity, advantages and great vitality of the Songun politics.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- A summer day in Juche 68 (1979), General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the construction site of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital.
					 Satisfied to see the building taking shape in a short span of time, he stepped into the main hall of the building.
					
					 An official told him that they planned to pave floors with marble from the ground to the second floor and coat the rest floors with artificial stone.
					
					 Listening to his explanation, Kim Jong Il said all the floors should be paved with marble cost what it might.
					
					 He then suggested that the floor of the main hall be decorated with jewels.
					
					 The officials were surprised by his suggest because it would cost a great deal. He told them again that it would be better to stud the floor with jewels for parturient women.
					
					 Thanks to his suggestion, the floor of the main hall was decorated with precious jewels such as ruby, sapphire and topaz.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Kwon Jong Ung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Kwon Jong Ung
						
Pyongyang, 23 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio el dia 23 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Kwon Jong Ung, condecorado con el Premio Kim Il Sung, Heroe del Trabajo y ex escritor del Colectivo de Creacion Literaria 15 de Abril, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Partidos politicos del Norte y el Sur publican llamamiento conjunto
articles.content:
Partidos politicos del Norte y el Sur publican llamamiento conjunto
Pyongyang, 23 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Partido Social-Democrata de Corea y el Partido de Obreros Democraticos del Sur de Corea hicieron publico el dia 23 el llamamiento conjunto a toda la nacion coreana en relacion con el centenario de la invencion coercitiva del "Tratado de Anexion de Corea a Japon" por parte de los imperialistas japoneses para "legalizar" la ocupacion militar y la dominacion colonial sobre Corea.
					  Los imperialistas japoneses falsificaron de manera coercitiva el "Tratado de Anexion de Corea a Japon" y otros documentos agresivos de toda indole despreciando hasta las elementales demandas de la ley internacional y practicaron durante mas de 40 anos la dominacion colonial acompanada de represion violenta, senala el documento y prosigue:
					
					Como consecuencia, la nacion coreana tuvo que vivir tragicamente como esclava y resultaron destruidos y saqueados incontables ruinas y patrimonios culturales y valiosos recursos naturales del pais.
					
					  Hasta la fecha, a los cien anos de la invencion del citado "tratado", Japon elude pedir disculpas e indemnizar sinceramente sus crimenes del pasado.
					
					  Si bien el mandatario japones publico recientemente una declaracion, esta no fue mas que otra burla y engano a la nacion coreana porque pidio a medias las "disculpas" excluyendo a la RPDC y no hizo referencia alguna a la indemnizacion exhaustiva.
					
					  Hoy dia, lejos de sacar las lecciones de su historia llena de crimenes ensangrentados, los reaccionarios japoneses incurren abiertamente en la usurpacion del islote Tok, la tergiversacion de la historia, la conversion de su pais en una potencia militar y la politica de discriminacion y desprecio a los coreanos residentes en Japon y aceleran cada vez mas hasta el armamentismo nuclear.
					
					  Todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben desplegar energicamente la lucha solidaria, unidos unanimemente bajo la bandera del patriotismo antijapones por encima de las diferencias de ideas, ideales y regimenes, por ajustar la cuenta, cueste lo que cueste, de los crimenes cometidos por Japon durante 100 anos contra la nacion coreana en este ano, fijado como "el de la lucha conjunta antijaponesa".
					
					  Ambos partidos exhortan fervorosamente a todos los coreanos a luchar unidos firmemente por la reunificacion de la patria y la solidaridad antijaponesa en este ano en que se cumplen el 10o aniversario de publicacion de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y el centenario de la invencion del "Tratado de Anexion de Corea a Japon".

articles.title: Agregados militares visitan unidad adscrita a division de tanques No. 105
articles.content:
Agregados militares visitan unidad adscrita a division de tanques No. 105
						
Pyongyang, 23 de agosto (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 50o aniversario del inicio de la orientacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, el Cuerpo de Agregados Militares acreditados en Corea visito este lunes una unidad subordinada a la Division Guardia de Tanques.105 "Seul" Ryu Kyong Su.
					Los visitantes recorrieron el cuartel, la sala de educacion y el comedor escuchando las explicaciones de que bajo la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il la unidad se ha convertido en las invencibles filas de combate.
					
					A continuacion, vieron un ejercicio de tanques y la funcion artistica de los uniformados.

articles.title: Denuncian represion fascista contra Han Sang Ryol
articles.content:
Denuncian represion fascista contra Han Sang Ryol
Pyongyang, 23 de agosto (ATCC) -- El pasado dia 20, decenas de gendarmes titeres y agentes del Ministerio de Reunificacion y el Servicio de Inteligencia, despachados por la camarilla traidora de Lee Myung Bak a la parte surena de Phanmunjom, se precipitaron contra el pastor surcoreano pro-reunificacion Han Sang Ryol tan pronto como este pasara la linea central de division y lo arrestaron por la fuerza torciendo sus ambos brazos.
					El portavoz del comite norteno por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio hizo publica el dia 22 una declaracion en que denuncio severamente a nombre de toda la nacion coreana el arresto y el encarcelamiento injusto de Han en que incurrieron los titeres surcoreanos desoyendo la advertencia de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la voz preocupada de los nacionales y extranjeros.
					
					Todas las actividades desarrolladas por el pastor surcoreano durante su permanencia en la RPDC son las sumamente justas para defender y ejecutar la declaracion conjunta Norte-Sur y lograr la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion de la nacion, afirma la nota y agrega que por eso, no pueden ser un crimen en ningun caso.
					
					Si la horda traidora de Lee Myung Bak no hubiera llevado las relaciones intercoreanas a la fase catastrofica ni impedido las actividades de las entidades del movimiento por la reunificacion ni creado la crisis de guerra inventando el gran complot anti-RPDC como el caso de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana y desplegando los ejercicios de guerra de agresion a la RPDC, el pastor Han no habria visitado a la RPDC a riesgo de la vida, subraya el documento y continua:
					
					"!Viva la reunificacion pacifica que se alcance entre nosotros, los connacionales!", consigna gritada a toda voz por el pastor Han cruzando la linea central de division de Phanmunjom, es el eco de la epoca que nadie puede detener.
					
					La banda traidora de Lee Myung Bak debe liberar ahora mismo al pastor encarcelado a punta de bayonetas y poner de inmediato fin a la represion fascista contra las entidades del movimiento por la reunificacion de distintos sectores.
					
					Todos los coreanos en el exterior y interior del pais deben levantarse activamente en la lucha por poner en libertad a las personalidades patrioticas de reunificacion detenidas injustamente como el pastor Han y frustrar las maniobras de confrontacion fratricida de la camarilla de titeres surcoreanos.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia represion a Han Sang Ryol en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia represion a Han Sang Ryol en Sur de Corea
						
Pyongyang, 23 de agosto (ATCC) -- Los titeres surcoreanas arrestaron el dia 20 al pastor Han Sang Ryol, asesor permanente de la Solidaridad por el Progreso del Sur de Corea quien regresaba luego de terminar su visita a Pyongyang, y le sometieron a un interrogatorio duro.
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un comentario individual de este lunes, lo califica de una represion brutal contra el patriotismo por la reunificacion y un crimen anti-reunificacion nunca justificable y prosigue:
					
					Lo que hizo el pastor Han en Pyongyang fue que el habia exhortado a ejecutar las declaraciones Norte-Sur y llevar adelante la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio. 
					
					La visita del pastor surcoreano a Pyongyang gana absoluto apoyo y elogio de todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar aspirantes a la unidad nacional, la paz y la reunificacion del pais.
					
					Sin embargo, los titeres surcoreanos cuestionan como un crimen tal justa visita y le reprime de modo brutal. 
					
					La banda de Lee Myung Bak, que al inventar el incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan", complot anti-RPDC nunca visto, llevo las relaciones intercoreanas a la ruptura total y al borde de la guerra, se encuentra en la crisis de dominacion sin salida debido a la fuerte protesta de las entidades y personalidades progresistas. 
					
					Para salir de este dilema y estabilizar la segunda mitad de su mandato, los titeres tildan a las fuerzas pro-reunificacion de las "fuerzas izquierdistas pronorcoreanas" y "las subordinadas al Norte". Al mismo tiempo, pretenden utilizar la visita del pastor Han a Pyongyang como una buena oportunidad para exterminarlas completamente. 
					
					La banda de Lee Myung Bak debe darse clara cuenta de la opinion publica de la poblacion surcoreana y todos los demas coreanos llenos de colera e indignacion y poner de inmediato fin a su imprudente represion contra las personalidades pro-reunificacion.

articles.title: FDRP urge disculpa e indemnizacion de Japon
articles.content:
FDRP urge disculpa e indemnizacion de Japon
						
Pyongyang, 23 de agosto (ATCC) -- Con motivo del centenario de la invencion del ilegal "Tratado de Anexion de Corea a Japon" por los imperialistas japoneses, el portavoz del Comite Central del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria (FDRP) hizo publica el dia 22 una declaracion.
					  Tanto en vista de los hechos historicos como a la luz de la ley internacional, ese "tratado" inventado el 22 de agosto de 1910 por los agresores imperialistas japoneses deviene una falsificacion totalmente ilegal e invalida y el documento criminal para la agresion sin parangon en la historia.
					
					  Los imperialistas japoneses hicieron sufrir incontables desgracias, penas y calamidades a la nacion coreana practicando la dominacion colonial mas barbara entre las registradas en la historia del oriente y el occidente.
					
					  Japon debe pedir disculpas sinceramente a la nacion coreana por sus actos agresivos, criminales y antieticos e indemnizarlos exhaustivamente.
					
					  Pero, hasta la fecha que paso un siglo, el no reconoce sus archi-crimenes de Estado eludiendo su responsabilidad, sino tergiversa y encomia la historia de agresion y maniobra freneticamente para arrebatar el islote Tok y lanzar la nueva agresion.
					
					  En particular, al adherirse a la politica hostil de EE.UU. a la RPDC, recrudece el complot y la sancion contra esta, el hostigamiento y la represion contra la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon. Por otra parte, actuan desesperadamente para realizar su antiguo sueno de la "esfera de coprosperidad de gran Asia oriental" tomando parte en la campana belicista anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					  Hoy dia, estas maniobras de Japon se fomentan por los actos vendepatrias projaponeses de la banda de Lee Myung Bak.
					
					  Por la dignidad y el honor de la nacion, cobraremos hasta el final la disculpa e indemnizacion de Japon y no perdonaremos ni en lo minimo las anacronicas maniobras de nueva agresion de los reaccionarios japoneses y sus alborotos de enfrentamiento con la RPDC.
					
					  Los reaccionarios japoneses deben actuar con prudencia, pedir disculpas sinceramente e indemnizar inmediatamente su historia criminal del pasado teniendo presente que seran arruinados si siguen actuando como ahora en desafio a la demanda de la epoca.
